auth.registerMessage: Register and gain access to our application.
auth.loginMessage: Log in now and access our application.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions of Use
terms.acceptanceText: By accessing and using the Autonexo system, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of the terms, you may not access or use the service.
terms.serviceText: Autonexo is a digital platform for comprehensive vehicle maintenance management, aimed at fleet administrators and operational technicians. It allows you to register vehicles, schedule maintenance, manage spare parts, generate reports, and more.
terms.userAccountsText: The user is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account and password. You agree to immediately notify any unauthorized use of your account.
terms.acceptableUseText: It is not allowed to use Autonexo for illegal purposes, transmit malware, overload the system, or access other users' information without authorization.
terms.intellectualPropertyText: All content, trademarks, logos, and visual elements are property of Autonexo and are protected by intellectual property laws. You are not permitted to reproduce, modify, or distribute these elements without prior permission.
terms.limitationOfLiabilityText: Autonexo is not responsible for direct or indirect losses arising from the use of the system. The service is provided "as is", without guarantees of continuous availability or specific results.
terms.modificationsText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Modifications will take effect once published on the website.
terms.contactText: For any questions or inquiries about these terms, you can contact us via email

pageNotFound.message: Oops! We couldn't find the page you requested.
